string.value: Two Ways to Get to Korean Folk Town

string.name: parent
string.value: Looking for the Korean Folk Town...

The letter that was sent to Camila was written by her pen pal, and it said she might not be able to write her again. Camila sensed something wrong might have happened to her friend, and asked me if I could visit her at Korean Folk Town, where she lived, and check on her.
At Korean Folk Town, I was able to meet Camila's pen pal, Kong Ji. She looked ecstatic after I gave her Camila's reply letter.

Ah, no.. This is bad news. She says she can't send me letters anymore. I don't know what's happening. Is she in any trouble? She didn't write why she can't write me back.. I am worried sick. I don't want to sound rude to you but.. Do you mind taking a long trip? I really want to know what's going on with her life. If it's not too much trouble, would you go to the town where Kong Ji lives for me?

Thank you. Please give Kong Ji my reply letter for me. Kong Ji lives in Korean Folk Town below Ludibrium Castle at Ossyria. To go to Korean Folk Town, there are two ways. One is by going through the air, and the other through the sea. When you decide which way you want to travel, tell me and I will give you specific instructions on how to get there.
I see.. I understand. It's really a long way..

Pardon? Sorry if I didn't hear you well. A lot of things to do for today and I'm running late on the schedule.. Is there something that you wanted to tell me? What is that you are holding on your hand?

Oh, this is Camilla's letter! Ah, so you actually came all the way from Victoria Island to here? She asked how I am doing these days.. I see.. I really wanted to continue writing letters to her but since after my stepmother moved in, I've been asked to do so many things I couldn't possibly sit down and write a letter. Thank you so much for delivering this letter for me.
Haven't you met Kong Ji, yet? She lives in Korean Folk Town. It's a long way from here, so good luck getting there~
Sorry but I'm really busy right now. If you are trying to buy something, talk to my stepmother. I should finish this before my stepmother checks again..
You've lost the letter to Kong Ji? Sigh.. I will write you another one.
Here you go. Please get this letter to Kong Ji this time for me.
